mapper.sql: a.owid AS "owid", a.tpjj AS "tpjj", a.jjnr AS "jjnr", a.lmbh AS "lmbh", a.fbr AS "fbr", a.fbsj AS "fbsj", a.sxsj AS "sxsj", a.wzbt AS "wzbt", a.wzly AS "wzly", a.wznr AS "wznr", a.wzzt AS "wzzt", a.ydcs AS "ydcs", a.html_path AS "htmlPath", a.atta_mm AS "attaMm", a.istop AS "istop", a.sxh AS "sxh", a.gjz AS "gjz", a.memo AS "memo", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.creator AS "creator", a.creator_name AS "creatorName", a.lastupdate AS "lastupdate", a.updator AS "updator", a.updator_name AS "updatorName", a.ver AS "ver", a.vertime AS "vertime", a.dept_id AS "deptId", a.dept_path AS "deptPath", a.delflg AS "delflg", a.state AS "state", a.xgfj AS "xgfj", a.exp1 AS "exp1", a.exp2 AS "exp2", a.exp3 AS "exp3", a.exp4 AS "exp4", a.exp5 AS "exp5", a.exp6 AS "exp6", a.exp7 AS "exp7", a.exp8 AS "exp8", a.exp9 AS "exp9", a.exp10 AS "exp10"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bckj_biz_article( owid, tpjj, jjnr, lmbh, fbr, fbsj, sxsj, wzbt, wzly, wznr, wzzt, ydcs, html_path, atta_mm, istop, sxh, gjz, memo, createtime, creator, creator_name, lastupdate, updator, updator_name, ver, vertime, dept_id, dept_path, delflg, state, xgfj, exp1, exp2, exp3, exp4, exp5, exp6, exp7, exp8, exp9, exp10 ) VALUES ( #{owid}, #{tpjj}, #{jjnr}, #{lmbh}, #{fbr}, #{fbsj}, #{sxsj}, #{wzbt}, #{wzly}, #{wznr}, #{wzzt}, #{ydcs}, #{htmlPath}, #{attaMm}, #{istop}, #{sxh}, #{gjz}, #{memo}, #{createtime}, #{creator}, #{creatorName}, #{lastupdate}, #{updator}, #{updatorName}, #{ver}, #{vertime}, #{deptId}, #{deptPath}, #{delflg}, #{state}, #{xgfj}, #{exp1}, #{exp2}, #{exp3}, #{exp4}, #{exp5}, #{exp6}, #{exp7}, #{exp8}, #{exp9}, #{exp10} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bckj_biz_article SET owid = #{owid}, tpjj = #{tpjj}, jjnr = #{jjnr}, lmbh = #{lmbh}, fbr = #{fbr}, fbsj = #{fbsj}, sxsj = #{sxsj}, wzbt = #{wzbt}, wzly = #{wzly}, wznr = #{wznr}, wzzt = #{wzzt}, ydcs = #{ydcs}, html_path = #{htmlPath}, atta_mm = #{attaMm}, istop = #{istop}, sxh = #{sxh}, gjz = #{gjz}, memo = #{memo}, createtime = #{createtime}, creator = #{creator}, creator_name = #{creatorName}, lastupdate = #{lastupdate}, updator = #{updator}, updator_name = #{updatorName}, ver = #{ver}, vertime = #{vertime}, dept_id = #{deptId}, dept_path = #{deptPath}, delflg = #{delflg}, state = #{state}, xgfj = #{xgfj}, exp1 = #{exp1}, exp2 = #{exp2}, exp3 = #{exp3}, exp4 = #{exp4}, exp5 = #{exp5}, exp6 = #{exp6}, exp7 = #{exp7}, exp8 = #{exp8}, exp9 = #{exp9}, exp10 = #{exp10} WHERE owid = #{owid}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.wzbt AS "wzbt",a.owid AS "owid",a.fbsj AS "fbsj",a.jjnr AS "jjnr",a.tpjj AS "tpjj" FROM bckj_biz_article a
( a.sxsj > SYSDATE() OR a.sxsj is NULL) AND a.lmbh IN( SELECT b.code FROM bckj_dic_menu b,bckj_dic_menu_apply c WHERE b.owid=c.MENU_REF_OWID AND c.wzbh=1 AND b.SJHQDX=5) AND a.wzzt = 1
AND (a.gjz LIKE concat('%',#{gjz},'%') OR a.wzbt LIKE concat('%',#{gjz},'%'))
ORDER BY ${orderBy}
